Song Ga In

Korean: 송가인

Hometown:

Jindo-gun, Jeollanam-do

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Jo Eun-sim
Native name:
조은심
Birthday:
Dec 26, 1986
Age:
38 years old

Introduction

Song Ga In is a South Korean trot singer under JG Star Entertainment and GainDal Entertainment. She is best known for being the winner of the reality audition show Miss Trot in 2019. She debuted on October 12, 2012 with the single "Mountain Wind" under her real name Jo Eun Sim.
